docs.snippet: The sports panorama for 1950 should go down in history as the year when no one seemed able to hazard the right guess. You made one pick; invariably something else happened. Upsets and unforeseen developments followed one another in rapid-fire order.
docs.lead_paragraph: The sports panorama for 1950 should go down in history as the year when no one seemed able to hazard the right guess. You made one pick; invariably something else happened. Upsets and unforeseen developments followed one another in rapid-fire order.

headline.main: BIG YEAR IN SPORTS MARKED BY UPSETS; FUTURE UNCERTAIN; Notre Dame and Army Elevens Toppled-Yanks Continued Sway in Baseball HOGAN IN GOLF COMEBACK But Louis Failed in Return to Ring-Leaders to Carry On Despite War Clouds

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 23 (AP)-- Fear of a total war is driving foreign refugee capital to Uruguay, where a traditional stable economy offers safety and security to investors.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 23 (AP)-- Fear of a total war is driving foreign refugee capital to Uruguay, where a traditional stable economy offers safety and security to investors.
docs.abstract: protection accorded foreign investors spurs influx of foreign refugee capital; sound econ noted

headline.main: REFUGEE CAPITAL FLOODING URUGUAY; $200,000,000 Recent Influx, Laid to Stable Economy, Sends Peso Soaring

docs.snippet: PARIS, Dec. 24 France is now covering with exports 80 per cent of her imports from Latin America, according to official foreign trade sources. Prior to the war, France bought from these countries double the amount she sold them.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, Dec. 24 France is now covering with exports 80 per cent of her imports from Latin America, according to official foreign trade sources. Prior to the war, France bought from these countries double the amount she sold them.
docs.abstract: France: French exports cover 80% of imports; rept, Jan-Oct
